friendly_name.label: Friendly name
friendly_name.description: Camera friendly name used in the Frigate UI

audio.label: Audio events
audio.description: Settings for audio-based event detection for this camera.

enabled.label: Enable audio detection
enabled.description: Enable or disable audio event detection for this camera.

max_not_heard.label: End timeout
max_not_heard.description: Amount of seconds without the configured audio type before the audio event is ended.

min_volume.label: Minimum volume
min_volume.description: Minimum RMS volume threshold required to run audio detection; lower values increase sensitivity (e.g., 200 high, 500 medium, 1000 low).

listen.label: Listen types
listen.description: List of audio event types to detect (for example: bark, fire_alarm, scream, speech, yell).

filters.label: Audio filters
filters.description: Per-audio-type filter settings such as confidence thresholds used to reduce false positives.

enabled_in_config.label: Original audio state
enabled_in_config.description: Indicates whether audio detection was originally enabled in the static config file.

num_threads.label: Detection threads
num_threads.description: Number of threads to use for audio detection processing.

audio_transcription.label: Audio transcription
audio_transcription.description: Settings for live and speech audio transcription used for events and live captions.

enabled.label: Enable transcription
enabled.description: Enable or disable manually triggered audio event transcription.

live_enabled.label: Live transcription
live_enabled.description: Enable streaming live transcription for audio as it is received.

birdseye.label: Birdseye
birdseye.description: Settings for the Birdseye composite view that composes multiple camera feeds into a single layout.

enabled.label: Enable Birdseye
enabled.description: Enable or disable the Birdseye view feature.

mode.label: Tracking mode
mode.description: Mode for including cameras in Birdseye: 'objects', 'motion', or 'continuous'.

order.label: Position
order.description: Numeric position controlling the camera's ordering in the Birdseye layout.

detect.label: Object Detection
detect.description: Settings for the detection/detect role used to run object detection and initialize trackers.

enabled.label: Detection enabled
enabled.description: Enable or disable object detection for this camera. Detection must be enabled for object tracking to run.

height.label: Detect height
height.description: Height (pixels) of frames used for the detect stream; leave empty to use the native stream resolution.

width.label: Detect width
width.description: Width (pixels) of frames used for the detect stream; leave empty to use the native stream resolution.

fps.label: Detect FPS
fps.description: Desired frames per second to run detection on; lower values reduce CPU usage (recommended value is 5, only set higher - at most 10 - if tracking extremely fast moving objects).

min_initialized.label: Minimum initialization frames
min_initialized.description: Number of consecutive detection hits required before creating a tracked object. Increase to reduce false initializations. Default value is fps divided by 2.

max_disappeared.label: Maximum disappeared frames
max_disappeared.description: Number of frames without a detection before a tracked object is considered gone.

stationary.label: Stationary objects config
stationary.description: Settings to detect and manage objects that remain stationary for a period of time.

interval.label: Stationary interval
interval.description: How often (in frames) to run a detection check to confirm a stationary object.

threshold.label: Stationary threshold
threshold.description: Number of frames with no position change required to mark an object as stationary.

max_frames.label: Max frames
max_frames.description: Limits how long stationary objects are tracked before being discarded.

default.label: Default max frames
default.description: Default maximum frames to track a stationary object before stopping.

objects.label: Object max frames
objects.description: Per-object overrides for maximum frames to track stationary objects.

classifier.label: Enable visual classifier
classifier.description: Use a visual classifier to detect truly stationary objects even when bounding boxes jitter.

annotation_offset.label: Annotation offset
annotation_offset.description: Milliseconds to shift detect annotations to better align timeline bounding boxes with recordings; can be positive or negative.

face_recognition.label: Face recognition
face_recognition.description: Settings for face detection and recognition for this camera.

min_area.label: Minimum face area
min_area.description: Minimum area (pixels) of a detected face box required to attempt recognition.

ffmpeg.label: FFmpeg
ffmpeg.description: FFmpeg settings including binary path, args, hwaccel options, and per-role output args.

path.label: FFmpeg path
path.description: Path to the FFmpeg binary to use or a version alias ("5.0" or "7.0").

global_args.label: FFmpeg global arguments
global_args.description: Global arguments passed to FFmpeg processes.

hwaccel_args.label: Hardware acceleration arguments
hwaccel_args.description: Hardware acceleration arguments for FFmpeg. Provider-specific presets are recommended.

input_args.label: Input arguments
input_args.description: Input arguments applied to FFmpeg input streams.

output_args.label: Output arguments
output_args.description: Default output arguments used for different FFmpeg roles such as detect and record.

detect.label: Detect output arguments
detect.description: Default output arguments for detect role streams.

record.label: Record output arguments
record.description: Default output arguments for record role streams.

retry_interval.label: FFmpeg retry time
retry_interval.description: Seconds to wait before attempting to reconnect a camera stream after failure. Default is 10.

apple_compatibility.label: Apple compatibility
apple_compatibility.description: Enable HEVC tagging for better Apple player compatibility when recording H.265.

gpu.label: GPU index
gpu.description: Default GPU index used for hardware acceleration if available.

inputs.label: Camera inputs
inputs.description: List of input stream definitions (paths and roles) for this camera.

path.label: Input path
path.description: Camera input stream URL or path.

global_args.label: FFmpeg global arguments
global_args.description: FFmpeg global arguments for this input stream.

hwaccel_args.label: Hardware acceleration arguments
hwaccel_args.description: Hardware acceleration arguments for this input stream.

input_args.label: Input arguments
input_args.description: Input arguments specific to this stream.

live.label: Live playback
live.description: Settings used by the Web UI to control live stream selection, resolution and quality.

streams.label: Live stream names
streams.description: Mapping of configured stream names to restream/go2rtc names used for live playback.

height.label: Live height
height.description: Height (pixels) to render the jsmpeg live stream in the Web UI; must be <= detect stream height.

quality.label: Live quality
quality.description: Encoding quality for the jsmpeg stream (1 highest, 31 lowest).

lpr.label: License Plate Recognition
lpr.description: License plate recognition settings including detection thresholds, formatting, and known plates.

enabled.label: Enable LPR
enabled.description: Enable or disable LPR on this camera.

expire_time.label: Expire seconds
expire_time.description: Time in seconds after which an unseen plate is expired from the tracker (for dedicated LPR cameras only).

min_area.label: Minimum plate area
min_area.description: Minimum plate area (pixels) required to attempt recognition.

enhancement.label: Enhancement level
enhancement.description: Enhancement level (0-10) to apply to plate crops prior to OCR; higher values may not always improve results, levels above 5 may only work with night time plates and should be used with caution.

motion.label: Motion detection
motion.description: Default motion detection settings for this camera.

enabled.label: Enable motion detection
enabled.description: Enable or disable motion detection for this camera.

threshold.label: Motion threshold
threshold.description: Pixel difference threshold used by the motion detector; higher values reduce sensitivity (range 1-255).

lightning_threshold.label: Lightning threshold
lightning_threshold.description: Threshold to detect and ignore brief lighting spikes (lower is more sensitive, values between 0.3 and 1.0).

improve_contrast.label: Improve contrast
improve_contrast.description: Apply contrast improvement to frames before motion analysis to help detection.

contour_area.label: Contour area
contour_area.description: Minimum contour area in pixels required for a motion contour to be counted.

delta_alpha.label: Delta alpha
delta_alpha.description: Alpha blending factor used in frame differencing for motion calculation.

frame_alpha.label: Frame alpha
frame_alpha.description: Alpha value used when blending frames for motion preprocessing.

frame_height.label: Frame height
frame_height.description: Height in pixels to scale frames to when computing motion.

mask.label: Mask coordinates
mask.description: Ordered x,y coordinates defining the motion mask polygon used to include/exclude areas.

mqtt_off_delay.label: MQTT off delay
mqtt_off_delay.description: Seconds to wait after last motion before publishing an MQTT 'off' state.

enabled_in_config.label: Original motion state
enabled_in_config.description: Indicates whether motion detection was enabled in the original static configuration.

objects.label: Objects
objects.description: Object tracking defaults including which labels to track and per-object filters.

track.label: Objects to track
track.description: List of object labels to track for this camera.

filters.label: Object filters
filters.description: Filters applied to detected objects to reduce false positives (area, ratio, confidence).

min_area.label: Minimum object area
min_area.description: Minimum bounding box area (pixels or percentage) required for this object type. Can be pixels (int) or percentage (float between 0.000001 and 0.99).

max_area.label: Maximum object area
max_area.description: Maximum bounding box area (pixels or percentage) allowed for this object type. Can be pixels (int) or percentage (float between 0.000001 and 0.99).

min_ratio.label: Minimum aspect ratio
min_ratio.description: Minimum width/height ratio required for the bounding box to qualify.

max_ratio.label: Maximum aspect ratio
max_ratio.description: Maximum width/height ratio allowed for the bounding box to qualify.

threshold.label: Confidence threshold
threshold.description: Average detection confidence threshold required for the object to be considered a true positive.

min_score.label: Minimum confidence
min_score.description: Minimum single-frame detection confidence required for the object to be counted.

mask.label: Filter mask
mask.description: Polygon coordinates defining where this filter applies within the frame.

mask.label: Object mask
mask.description: Mask polygon used to prevent object detection in specified areas.

genai.label: GenAI object config
genai.description: GenAI options for describing tracked objects and sending frames for generation.

enabled.label: Enable GenAI
enabled.description: Enable GenAI generation of descriptions for tracked objects by default.

use_snapshot.label: Use snapshots
use_snapshot.description: Use object snapshots instead of thumbnails for GenAI description generation.

prompt.label: Caption prompt
prompt.description: Default prompt template used when generating descriptions with GenAI.

object_prompts.label: Object prompts
object_prompts.description: Per-object prompts to customize GenAI outputs for specific labels.

objects.label: GenAI objects
objects.description: List of object labels to send to GenAI by default.

required_zones.label: Required zones
required_zones.description: Zones that must be entered for objects to qualify for GenAI description generation.

debug_save_thumbnails.label: Save thumbnails
debug_save_thumbnails.description: Save thumbnails sent to GenAI for debugging and review.

send_triggers.label: GenAI triggers
send_triggers.description: Defines when frames should be sent to GenAI (on end, after updates, etc.).

tracked_object_end.label: Send on end
tracked_object_end.description: Send a request to GenAI when the tracked object ends.

after_significant_updates.label: Early GenAI trigger
after_significant_updates.description: Send a request to GenAI after a specified number of significant updates for the tracked object.

enabled_in_config.label: Original GenAI state
enabled_in_config.description: Indicates whether GenAI was enabled in the original static config.

record.label: Recording
record.description: Recording and retention settings for this camera.

enabled.label: Enable recording
enabled.description: Enable or disable recording for this camera.

expire_interval.label: Record cleanup interval
expire_interval.description: Minutes between cleanup passes that remove expired recording segments.

continuous.label: Continuous retention
continuous.description: Number of days to retain recordings regardless of tracked objects or motion. Set to 0 if you only want to retain recordings of alerts and detections.

motion.label: Motion retention
motion.description: Number of days to retain recordings triggered by motion regardless of tracked objects. Set to 0 if you only want to retain recordings of alerts and detections.

detections.label: Detection retention
detections.description: Recording retention settings for detection events including pre/post capture durations.

pre_capture.label: Pre-capture seconds
pre_capture.description: Number of seconds before the detection event to include in the recording.

post_capture.label: Post-capture seconds
post_capture.description: Number of seconds after the detection event to include in the recording.

retain.label: Event retention
retain.description: Retention settings for recordings of detection events.

days.label: Retention days
days.description: Number of days to retain recordings of detection events.

mode.label: Retention mode
mode.description: Mode for retention: all (save all segments), motion (save segments with motion), or active_objects (save segments with active objects).

alerts.label: Alert retention
alerts.description: Recording retention settings for alert events including pre/post capture durations.

pre_capture.label: Pre-capture seconds
pre_capture.description: Number of seconds before the detection event to include in the recording.

post_capture.label: Post-capture seconds
post_capture.description: Number of seconds after the detection event to include in the recording.

retain.label: Event retention
retain.description: Retention settings for recordings of detection events.

days.label: Retention days
days.description: Number of days to retain recordings of detection events.

mode.label: Retention mode
mode.description: Mode for retention: all (save all segments), motion (save segments with motion), or active_objects (save segments with active objects).

export.label: Export config
export.description: Settings used when exporting recordings such as timelapse and hardware acceleration.

hwaccel_args.label: Export hwaccel args
hwaccel_args.description: Hardware acceleration args to use for export/transcode operations.

preview.label: Preview config
preview.description: Settings controlling the quality of recording previews shown in the UI.

quality.label: Preview quality
quality.description: Preview quality level (very_low, low, medium, high, very_high).

enabled_in_config.label: Original recording state
enabled_in_config.description: Indicates whether recording was enabled in the original static configuration.

review.label: Review
review.description: Settings that control alerts, detections, and GenAI review summaries used by the UI and storage for this camera.

alerts.label: Alerts config
alerts.description: Settings for which tracked objects generate alerts and how alerts are retained.

enabled.label: Enable alerts
enabled.description: Enable or disable alert generation for this camera.

labels.label: Alert labels
labels.description: List of object labels that qualify as alerts (for example: car, person).

required_zones.label: Required zones
required_zones.description: Zones that an object must enter to be considered an alert; leave empty to allow any zone.

enabled_in_config.label: Original alerts state
enabled_in_config.description: Tracks whether alerts were originally enabled in the static configuration.

cutoff_time.label: Alerts cutoff time
cutoff_time.description: Seconds to wait after no alert-causing activity before cutting off an alert.

detections.label: Detections config
detections.description: Settings for creating detection events (non-alert) and how long to keep them.

enabled.label: Enable detections
enabled.description: Enable or disable detection events for this camera.

labels.label: Detection labels
labels.description: List of object labels that qualify as detection events.

required_zones.label: Required zones
required_zones.description: Zones that an object must enter to be considered a detection; leave empty to allow any zone.

cutoff_time.label: Detections cutoff time
cutoff_time.description: Seconds to wait after no detection-causing activity before cutting off a detection.

enabled_in_config.label: Original detections state
enabled_in_config.description: Tracks whether detections were originally enabled in the static configuration.

genai.label: GenAI config
genai.description: Controls use of generative AI for producing descriptions and summaries of review items.

enabled.label: Enable GenAI descriptions
enabled.description: Enable or disable GenAI-generated descriptions and summaries for review items.

alerts.label: Enable GenAI for alerts
alerts.description: Use GenAI to generate descriptions for alert items.

detections.label: Enable GenAI for detections
detections.description: Use GenAI to generate descriptions for detection items.

image_source.label: Review image source
image_source.description: Source of images sent to GenAI ('preview' or 'recordings'); 'recordings' uses higher quality frames but more tokens.

additional_concerns.label: Additional concerns
additional_concerns.description: A list of additional concerns or notes the GenAI should consider when evaluating activity on this camera.

debug_save_thumbnails.label: Save thumbnails
debug_save_thumbnails.description: Save thumbnails that are sent to the GenAI provider for debugging and review.

enabled_in_config.label: Original GenAI state
enabled_in_config.description: Tracks whether GenAI review was originally enabled in the static configuration.

preferred_language.label: Preferred language
preferred_language.description: Preferred language to request from the GenAI provider for generated responses.

activity_context_prompt.label: Activity context prompt
activity_context_prompt.description: Custom prompt describing what is and is not suspicious activity to provide context for GenAI summaries.

semantic_search.label: Semantic Search
semantic_search.description: Settings for semantic search which builds and queries object embeddings to find similar items.

triggers.label: Triggers
triggers.description: Actions and matching criteria for camera-specific semantic search triggers.

friendly_name.label: Friendly name
friendly_name.description: Optional friendly name displayed in the UI for this trigger.

enabled.label: Enable this trigger
enabled.description: Enable or disable this semantic search trigger.

type.label: Trigger type
type.description: Type of trigger: 'thumbnail' (match against image) or 'description' (match against text).

data.label: Trigger content
data.description: Text phrase or thumbnail ID to match against tracked objects.

threshold.label: Trigger threshold
threshold.description: Minimum similarity score (0-1) required to activate this trigger.

actions.label: Trigger actions
actions.description: List of actions to execute when trigger matches (notification, sub_label, attribute).

snapshots.label: Snapshots
snapshots.description: Settings for saved JPEG snapshots of tracked objects for this camera.

enabled.label: Snapshots enabled
enabled.description: Enable or disable saving snapshots for this camera.

clean_copy.label: Save clean copy
clean_copy.description: Save an unannotated clean copy of snapshots in addition to annotated ones.

timestamp.label: Timestamp overlay
timestamp.description: Overlay a timestamp on saved snapshots.

bounding_box.label: Bounding box overlay
bounding_box.description: Draw bounding boxes for tracked objects on saved snapshots.

crop.label: Crop snapshot
crop.description: Crop saved snapshots to the detected object's bounding box.

required_zones.label: Required zones
required_zones.description: Zones an object must enter for a snapshot to be saved.

height.label: Snapshot height
height.description: Height (pixels) to resize saved snapshots to; leave empty to preserve original size.

retain.label: Snapshot retention
retain.description: Retention settings for saved snapshots including default days and per-object overrides.

default.label: Default retention
default.description: Default number of days to retain snapshots.

mode.label: Retention mode
mode.description: Mode for retention: all (save all segments), motion (save segments with motion), or active_objects (save segments with active objects).

objects.label: Object retention
objects.description: Per-object overrides for snapshot retention days.

quality.label: JPEG quality
quality.description: JPEG encode quality for saved snapshots (0-100).

timestamp_style.label: Timestamp style
timestamp_style.description: Styling options for in-feed timestamps applied to recordings and snapshots.

position.label: Timestamp position
position.description: Position of the timestamp on the image (tl/tr/bl/br).

format.label: Timestamp format
format.description: Datetime format string used for timestamps (Python datetime format codes).

color.label: Timestamp color
color.description: RGB color values for the timestamp text (all values 0-255).

thickness.label: Timestamp thickness
thickness.description: Line thickness of the timestamp text.

effect.label: Timestamp effect
effect.description: Visual effect for the timestamp text (none, solid, shadow).

best_image_timeout.label: Best image timeout
best_image_timeout.description: How long to wait for the image with the highest confidence score.

enabled.label: Send image
enabled.description: Enable publishing image snapshots for objects to MQTT topics for this camera.

timestamp.label: Add timestamp
timestamp.description: Overlay a timestamp on images published to MQTT.

bounding_box.label: Add bounding box
bounding_box.description: Draw bounding boxes on images published over MQTT.

crop.label: Crop image
crop.description: Crop images published to MQTT to the detected object's bounding box.

height.label: Image height
height.description: Height (pixels) to resize images published over MQTT.

required_zones.label: Required zones
required_zones.description: Zones that an object must enter for an MQTT image to be published.

quality.label: JPEG quality
quality.description: JPEG quality for images published to MQTT (0-100).

notifications.label: Notifications
notifications.description: Settings to enable and control notifications for this camera.

enabled.label: Enable notifications
enabled.description: Enable or disable notifications for this camera.

email.label: Notification email
email.description: Email address used for push notifications or required by certain notification providers.

cooldown.label: Cooldown period
cooldown.description: Cooldown (seconds) between notifications to avoid spamming recipients.

enabled_in_config.label: Original notifications state
enabled_in_config.description: Indicates whether notifications were enabled in the original static configuration.

onvif.label: ONVIF
onvif.description: ONVIF connection and PTZ autotracking settings for this camera.

host.label: ONVIF host
host.description: Host (and optional scheme) for the ONVIF service for this camera.

port.label: ONVIF port
port.description: Port number for the ONVIF service.

user.label: ONVIF username
user.description: Username for ONVIF authentication; some devices require admin user for ONVIF.

tls_insecure.label: Disable TLS verify
tls_insecure.description: Skip TLS verification and disable digest auth for ONVIF (unsafe; use in safe networks only).

autotracking.label: Autotracking
autotracking.description: Automatically track moving objects and keep them centered in the frame using PTZ camera movements.

enabled.label: Enable Autotracking
enabled.description: Enable or disable automatic PTZ camera tracking of detected objects.

calibrate_on_startup.label: Calibrate on start
calibrate_on_startup.description: Measure PTZ motor speeds on startup to improve tracking accuracy. Frigate will update config with movement_weights after calibration.

zooming.label: Zoom mode
zooming.description: Control zoom behavior: disabled (pan/tilt only), absolute (most compatible), or relative (concurrent pan/tilt/zoom).

zoom_factor.label: Zoom factor
zoom_factor.description: Control zoom level on tracked objects. Lower values keep more scene in view; higher values zoom in closer but may lose tracking. Values between 0.1 and 0.75.

track.label: Tracked objects
track.description: List of object types that should trigger autotracking.

required_zones.label: Required zones
required_zones.description: Objects must enter one of these zones before autotracking begins.

return_preset.label: Return preset
return_preset.description: ONVIF preset name configured in camera firmware to return to after tracking ends.

timeout.label: Return timeout
timeout.description: Wait this many seconds after losing tracking before returning camera to preset position.

movement_weights.label: Movement weights
movement_weights.description: Calibration values automatically generated by camera calibration. Do not modify manually.

enabled_in_config.label: Original autotrack state
enabled_in_config.description: Internal field to track whether autotracking was enabled in configuration.

ignore_time_mismatch.label: Ignore time mismatch
ignore_time_mismatch.description: Ignore time synchronization differences between camera and Frigate server for ONVIF communication.

ui.label: Camera UI
ui.description: Display ordering and visibility for this camera in the UI. Ordering affects the default dashboard. For more granular control, use camera groups.

order.label: UI order
order.description: Numeric order used to sort the camera in the UI (default dashboard and lists); larger numbers appear later.

dashboard.label: Show in UI
dashboard.description: Toggle whether this camera is visible everywhere in the Frigate UI. Disabling this will require manually editing the config to view this camera in the UI again.

webui_url.label: Camera URL
webui_url.description: URL to visit the camera directly from system page

zones.label: Zones
zones.description: Zones allow you to define a specific area of the frame so you can determine whether or not an object is within a particular area.

friendly_name.label: Zone name
friendly_name.description: A user-friendly name for the zone, displayed in the Frigate UI. If not set, a formatted version of the zone name will be used.

filters.label: Zone filters
filters.description: Filters to apply to objects within this zone. Used to reduce false positives or restrict which objects are considered present in the zone.

min_area.label: Minimum object area
min_area.description: Minimum bounding box area (pixels or percentage) required for this object type. Can be pixels (int) or percentage (float between 0.000001 and 0.99).

max_area.label: Maximum object area
max_area.description: Maximum bounding box area (pixels or percentage) allowed for this object type. Can be pixels (int) or percentage (float between 0.000001 and 0.99).

min_ratio.label: Minimum aspect ratio
min_ratio.description: Minimum width/height ratio required for the bounding box to qualify.

max_ratio.label: Maximum aspect ratio
max_ratio.description: Maximum width/height ratio allowed for the bounding box to qualify.

threshold.label: Confidence threshold
threshold.description: Average detection confidence threshold required for the object to be considered a true positive.

min_score.label: Minimum confidence
min_score.description: Minimum single-frame detection confidence required for the object to be counted.

mask.label: Filter mask
mask.description: Polygon coordinates defining where this filter applies within the frame.

coordinates.label: Coordinates
coordinates.description: Polygon coordinates that define the zone area. Can be a comma-separated string or a list of coordinate strings. Coordinates should be relative (0-1) or absolute (legacy).

distances.label: Real-world distances
distances.description: Optional real-world distances for each side of the zone quadrilateral, used for speed or distance calculations. Must have exactly 4 values if set.

inertia.label: Inertia frames
inertia.description: Number of consecutive frames an object must be detected in the zone before it is considered present. Helps filter out transient detections.

loitering_time.label: Loitering seconds
loitering_time.description: Number of seconds an object must remain in the zone to be considered as loitering. Set to 0 to disable loitering detection.

speed_threshold.label: Minimum speed
speed_threshold.description: Minimum speed (in real-world units if distances are set) required for an object to be considered present in the zone. Used for speed-based zone triggers.

objects.label: Trigger objects
objects.description: List of object types (from labelmap) that can trigger this zone. Can be a string or a list of strings. If empty, all objects are considered.

enabled_in_config.label: Original camera state
enabled_in_config.description: Keep track of original state of camera.
